title: Surveillance Device Signature Format v1
description: Portable interchange format for RF surveillance device signatures. Designed for cross-tool interoperability between AirHound, FlockOff, ESP32 Marauder, FlockSquawk, Flock-You, FlockBack, and similar projects.

$schema.description: Optional reference to this schema for editor validation.

version.description: Schema version. Must be 1 for this version of the format.

signatures.description: Array of atomic signature definitions. Each signature is a single, self-contained matching criterion. Implementations MUST validate that all signature id values are unique within this array.

rules.description: Array of detection rules. Each rule composes signatures with boolean logic into a named device detection. Implementations MUST validate that all rule id values are unique within this array.

signature_id.description: Unique identifier. Lowercase alphanumeric with hyphens and underscores.

mac_oui.description: Match a device by the first 3 bytes (OUI) of its MAC address.

oui.description: 3-byte OUI prefix in colon-separated uppercase hex, e.g. "B4:1E:52".

string_match.description: String matching strategy. "regex" uses ECMA-262 (JavaScript) regular expressions for maximum portability.

wifi_ssid.description: Match a WiFi network by its SSID.

value.description: The SSID string or pattern to match against.

case_sensitive.description: Whether the match is case-sensitive. Default: true.

ble_name.description: Match a BLE device by its advertised local name.

value.description: The BLE local name string or pattern to match against.

case_sensitive.description: Whether the match is case-sensitive. Default: true.

ble_service_uuid.description: Match a BLE device by an advertised service UUID.

uuid.description: BLE service UUID in lowercase hex. 4 chars for 16-bit (e.g. "3100"), or full 128-bit form (e.g. "00003100-0000-1000-8000-00805f9b34fb").

ble_manufacturer_id.description: Match a BLE device by its manufacturer-specific data company ID.

company_id.description: Bluetooth SIG assigned company identifier (16-bit). E.g. 2504 for XUNTONG.

ble_ad_bytes.description: Match a BLE device by a raw byte pattern in its advertisement payload. Supports wildcard bytes for partial matching.

bytes.description: Byte sequence to match. Integers (0-255) are exact; null is a wildcard matching any byte.

offset.description: Fixed byte offset into the advertisement payload. If omitted, the pattern is searched anywhere in the payload.

rule.description: A detection rule that composes signatures into a named device detection using boolean logic.

name.description: Human-readable device name, e.g. "Flock Safety Camera".

detect.description: Boolean expression tree over signature references.

expr.description: A boolean expression node. Leaf nodes reference a signature by ID. Interior nodes combine children with anyOf (OR), allOf (AND), or not (negation).

expr_sig.description: Leaf: matches if the referenced signature matches the scan input.

sig.description: References a signature by its id. Implementations MUST validate that this references a defined signature in the signatures array.

expr_any_of.description: Logical OR: matches if ANY child expression matches.

expr_all_of.description: Logical AND: matches if ALL child expressions match.

expr_not.description: Logical NOT: matches if the child expression does NOT match. Useful for excluding false positives.
